about_the_game:
Challenge yourself with more epic content for the German high-speed network! Munich-Augsburg Scenario Pack 01 includes 10 challenging and enjoyable scenarios for the Munich-Augsburg Route Add-On, covering passenger operations in this commuter route.

Take the controls of the DB ICE 2, DB BR 423, and DB BR 440 ‘Coradia Continental’ on busy services along the line following real world timetables with real world challenges from poor weather to red signals.

Included Scenarios


  • ICE 580
  • ICE 680
  • S-Bahn to Mammendorf
  • S-Bahn to Munich
  • Freight to Augsburg
  • Fugger-Express I
  • Fugger-Express II
  • Engineering Works
  • IC 1269
  • Crawling home

Please Note: Munich-Augsburg Route Add-On, DB BR423 EMU Add-On, the DB BR 440 ‘Coradia Continental’ Loco Add-On, and the DB ICE 2 EMU Add-On are required, as separate purchases, in order to play the scenarios featured in this add-on.

Take the controls of the DB ICE 2, DB BR 423, and DB BR 440 ‘Coradia Continental’ on busy services along the line following real world timetables with real world challenges from poor weather to red signals.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor:Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:40 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
